R.content: [re: Algeria] immunize against suicide of democracy by committing the suicide (value of this strategy can neither be confirmed nor refuted)
R.linkedContent: [re: Algeria] immunize against suicide of democracy by committing the suicide (value of this strategy can neither be confirmed nor refuted)

R.content: perverse autoimmunity of democracy due to double couple: “freedom and equality” and “equality acc. #, equality acc. worth” > in the name of one couple, both couples destroyed

R.content: autoimmunity: a murder that becomes suicide, a suicide that becomes murder

R.content: autoimmunity is suicidal while robbing suicide itself of its meaning and supposed integrity

R.content: antinomy, impossibility, source of every autoimmune process

R.content: equality is not equal to itself (paradoxes of autoimmune)

R.content: the unconscious remains the most vital reserve of the self-destructive conservation of the “subject” or of egological ipseity; without autoimmunity, no sadism, masochism, consciousness, death drive

R.content: autoimmunity, cruelty itself, autoinfection of all autoaffectivity, the self, ipse, autos finds itself infected (once it needs event, time, other) precedes or anticipates oppositions btwn physis & its others (tekhnē, nomos, thesis) > life-death

FK.content: reactivity of resentment opposes that which it hates in itself by excising it [auto-immunity]
FK.linkedContent: reactivity of resentment opposes that which it hates in itself by excising it [auto-immunity]

FK.content: auto-immunity haunts community: hyperbole of community’s own possibility
auto-immunity of religion: btwn sacrifice and respect for life

FK.content: in view of invisible, spectral sur-vival, an excess beyond living, life worth more than life, space of death opens—linked to automaton (exemplarily “phallic”), to technics, machine, prosthesis

FK.content: these dimensions of self-sacrificial supplementarity, the auto-co-immunity, com-mon auto-immunity, keep community alive, open to something other, more than itself (a spectralizing messiancity beyond all messianism)

FK.content: in name of Islam, in name of “religion,” desperate (auto-immune) gesture, attacks blood of its own body

FK.content: the 2 types of auto-immune supplementarity imposed by religious reactivity to technology: 1) violent sundering (Entwürzelung) from all roots, all sacred: identity, proper name, culture, memory 2) counter-fetishism, animism of technology as evil [See H p. 53 & SPOM p. 64]

H.content: become virtually xenophobic to protect one’s hospitality

EM.content: interest in universality of anthropos a sign of West’s attempt to interiorize, master what’s different from it, l’effet de cette différence d’un tout autre ordre, where philosophical colloquium has no meaning, this other space neither barren, nor desert-like

PP.content: [Plato’s puritanical auto-immunity] illness as allergy to alien element, “normal” disease defends itself; God cannot have an allergic reaction > perfection and immortality: no relation to outside; but how can we exclude the parasitic supplement, pharmakon?

FWT.linkedContent: Europe exports: 1) norms, advancements, language [re: consolidation of rights, laws, to sovereignty of subject] 2) its auto-hetero-deconstructive capacity or auto-immunity

ATIA.content: Bellerophon’s modesty, shame before the immodest women saves the city, this immunizing drive, Heidegger’s Verhaltenheit, restraint, is the origin of the religious, of the immune, sacred (heilig), holy, separate (kadosh) [it also can be perverted: auto-immunity; virtual, analogical relation btwn auto-biography & auto-immunity]

PSSS.content: “it’s not going well,” a redemptive concern—necessity to save: salutary, sanitary, immunitary concern > also, a gesture of war: militant saves by routing a resistance: French Revolution’s terror, Comité de Salut Public

PSSS.content: psychoanalysis has failed to say anything original about mondialisation, tele-technic virtuality—has resisted, in autoimmune fashion, changing, thinking through, fundamental axioms of ethics, law, politics > must be a revolution re: concepts cruelty, sovereignty, resistance
PSSS.linkedContent: psychoanalysis has failed to say anything original about mondialisation, tele-technic virtuality—has resisted, in autoimmune fashion, changing, thinking through, fundamental axioms of ethics, law, politics > must be a revolution re: concepts cruelty, sovereignty, resistance

PSSS.content: condemning/saving inscribe in concepts sovereignty & cruelty an ambiguity as unrelievable as autoimmunity itself: in any paregicide, any Oedipus, any totem + taboo, any republican or democratic installation of brothers, no way to know whether paregicide took place or not, took place w/out taking place, before any question about it [see HYMEN]

TN.content: Nancy’s thought of touch as flailing, weighing, scales or scourge of God (all senses of French fléau), exapropriation of most proper, autoimmune desire of proper, expulsion: eating one’s heart out > “saisie dessaisie ou dessaisissante (a seizing put-upon or at grips with one’s grasp)”

TN.content: Nancy’s festering immundity, what is expulsed, the abjected/ejected of (auto-)immune—isn’t law of autoimmunity what commands all Christian thinking of “flesh”?
